name: from
text: Where are you from and where are you based now?

name: website
placeholder: Portfolio, Twitter, Github, Flickr, Vimeo, etc.
text: Do you have a website or other places we can see your work?

name: collaborate
text: If you could collaborate / work with three people, who would they be and why?

name: want
text: What do you want the School for Poetic Computation to be?

name: create
text: What would you like to learn and create at the school?

name: hear
text: How did you hear about SFPC? and what made you want to apply?
